name: Spect
headline: Value-based retinal screening in primary care to prevent blindness.
description: Vision Disease cause innumerable cases of preventable blindness globally - 415 million diabetic patients worldwide are susceptible to Diabetic Retinopathy (DR), Glaucoma, and more. Current screening protocols for vision disease require ophthalmologists to manually diagnose patients through visual assessment of the fundus. Given the large number of diabetes patients in various communities, this process is expensive, inefficient, and an undue burden on eye clinics.

founders.name: Ankur Gupta, Founder/CEO
founders.description: After undergrad and a Master's at Stanford University, where I completed the Biodesign program, I started my career in healthcare venture capital. Afterward, I went to medical school at UT Southwestern in Texas and did my residency training in Ophthalmology at the National Eye Institute (NIH), University of Chicago, Geisinger, and Stanford Medicine. I’ve mentored several and started three companies, including Spect.

raw_markdown='[Spect and DocGo partner to reduce care gaps and improve eye and vision health!](http://www.getspect.com/</newsroom/docgo-and-spect-partner-to-reduce-care-gaps-and-improve-eye-and-vision-health>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e0ba1ef15200749b06eac1a/637d0dfabf971e44c59388ef_logo-website-white.png)](http://www.getspect.com/</>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e0ba1ef15200749b06eac1a/637d0fcd8f6359876504c581_icon.menu.open.svg)
[Enterprise Solutions](http://www.getspect.com/</#enterprise-solutions>)[Who we Help](http://www.getspect.com/</#who-spect-helps>)[Value we Provide](http://www.getspect.com/</value>)[Partners](http://www.getspect.com/</#partners>)[News](http://www.getspect.com/</newsroom>)[About](http://www.getspect.com/</about-us>)[Learn More](http://www.getspect.com/<https:/share.hsforms.com/1Suui3fr0TCGyOf8ykLR4KQd6956>)
# Eyecare, Anywhere.
Our mission is to prevent blindness with the early detection of eye disease, and fill a critical healthcare gap while delivering best-in-class service.
[Learn More](http://www.getspect.com/<https:/www.youtube.com/watch?v=5bN569Ikh4A&list=PLLjp4tz-KyreVnsMocYfXObJ3Iz6WrvIT>)
# Vision loss shouldn’t be ignored.
The CDC reports that vision loss still affects over **90 Million adults** in the United States. This problem is exacerbated by the shortage of eye specialists with **1 eye specialist for every 17,000 Americans**.
# Diabetes has also reached an epidemic stage with:
![3 people with 1 colored in blue to depict 1 in 3 fraction](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e0ba1ef15200749b06eac1a/638aadb9698caa6d7c395f21_1%20in%203%20updated.svg)
### 1 in 3 American Adults
have **diabetes or prediabetes,** and of those with prediabetes, **more than 80% don't know they have it**.
![Pie chart with 90% colored](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e0ba1ef15200749b06eac1a/638e8cd299a7992b5c1ceb03_pie%20chart%20updated.svg)
### 90% of blindness
caused by **diabetes is preventable** if detected and treated early. **Less than 40% of patients** with diabetes are getting their annual dilated eye exam which the [AAO recommends](http://www.getspect.com/<https:/www.aao.org/eye-health/tips-prevention/top-five-diabetes-steps>).
# How does the Spect platform prevent vision loss?
Spect’s enterprise solution is the only vertically integrated platform that solves all the pain points with conventional retinal exams. With our portable retinal camera, **Diabetic Retinopathy screenings** or other retinal eye exams can now be conducted **anywhere** using**your existing medical staff** , instead of needing to refer the patient to another specialist.
### Perform retinal exams in the comfort of your clinic or patient’s home.
The Spect retinal camera is **easy to use, portable, and seamlessly fits into your clinical workflow.** Existing medical staff can learn to use the Spect solution in **under 15 minutes with 95% success.**
![Young Indian woman sitting in a chair looking straight ahead](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e0ba1ef15200749b06eac1a/6386bc730d5ad17215e20bc3_solution-1.jpg)
### Easy retinal exams in under 3 minutes
To conduct an exam, it's as simple as positioning the Spect retinal camera in front of the patient’s eye.
The images are captured via our **human-in-the-loop assisted telemedicine platform** and uploaded to the cloud, ensuring quick dilated exams and gradability above 95%.
![Young Indian woman looking straight ahead. Spect handheld fundus camera is up to the woman's face.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e0ba1ef15200749b06eac1a/6386bc860d5ad1ad5ae20d3b_solution-2.jpg)
### Quick report turnaround in under 24 hours
Today, one of our **board certified ophthalmologists** will grade the captured images and inform you on next steps via a diagnostic report sent to your EMR. In the near future, we’ll leverage AI to capture and grade images.
Our doctors can screen for a variety of eye diseases including: **diabetic retinopathy, stages of dry macular degeneration, end stage wet macular degeneration** , and many others.
![A blond woman wearing a lab coat and glasses](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e0ba1ef15200749b06eac1a/637c10e4925250edd1cb52e3_solutions%20image%203.jpg)

![Image of the EMR and EHR logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e0ba1ef15200749b06eac1a/637c1a2d0fae713e588ac8f2_pill-4.png)
EMR + EHR Integration

And so much more!
![A colored image taken from the Spect fundus camera showing the retina, macula and optic nerve](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e0ba1ef15200749b06eac1a/638e901b87631bbef86ea0b1_RetinaBlackRectangle-sm%20\(3\).svg)

# Some of our partners
We’re incredibly fortunate to have amazing partners spanning a diverse range of health care markets that also believe in our mission to bring eyecare, anywhere.
[![White male looking straight ahead](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e0ba1ef15200749b06eac1a/658ba9d83400b61bef6622cf_Dr.%20Chin%20\(1\).png)![White male looking straight ahead](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e0ba1ef15200749b06eac1a/658b8c06cac73994ba718c35_Frame%20617.png)"Having Spect's diabetic retinal screening co-located in the patient’s primary care office increased rates of completion compared to the traditional referral model. We **increased our diabetic retinal screening by 4x with Spect, from 10% to 40% after the first year.** "Justin Chin, DO, Lifelong Medical Care](http://www.getspect.com/<https:/lifelongmedical.org/>)
[![White male looking straight ahead](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e0ba1ef15200749b06eac1a/66274818808ef9d3d369ac62_Aaron%20Severs.png)![White male looking straight ahead](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e0ba1ef15200749b06eac1a/66274a1a6aca3c89ee42c1ce_DocGo_Logo.png)“We **evaluated multiple options** for in-home diabetic retinopathy screenings and **chose Spect as our preferred solution**. We chose Spect because of its **exceptional portability, user-friendly design, and quick training process**. Spect has scaled with us to deployments in **5 states** and has contributed to our success at **closing gaps in care through DocGo’s health plan partnerships** ”**Aaron Severs, Chief Product Officer, DocGo**](http://www.getspect.com/<https:/docgo.com/>)
[![White male looking straight ahead](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e0ba1ef15200749b06eac1a/66274c86600f2368979dac65_Salliann.png)![White male looking straight ahead](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e0ba1ef15200749b06eac1a/66274afb204781422b80a366_Priority%20Partners%20Logo.png) “**Spect has been an amazing implementation to our clinics**. We were in the process of searching for a device to perform Diabetic Eye Examinations on our patient population. Everything we found on the market was a table-top device or required re-calibration once it was moved. Once we heard about the Spect device, **its unique design, and ease of use** , we were immediately intrigued. **The entire process working with Spect has been seamless**. We appreciate all the help they provided to help us roll out these devices to our clinics. We were able to **deploy over 27 cameras across our 5 FQHCs with a total of 19 clinics**. We look forward to our continued partnership with Spect and how it will **aid in gap closures across our clinics.** ”**Salliann Alborn, CEO, Maryland Community Health System**](http://www.getspect.com/<https:/www.ppmco.org/>)

# Recent news
[![CB insights digital top 150 logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e0ba1ef15200749b06eac1a/668c9765fdd806287df49081_DocGo%20%2B%20Spect%20\(1\).png)July 9th, 2024Spect and DocGo partner to reduce care gaps and improve eye and vision health](http://www.getspect.com/</newsroom/docgo-and-spect-partner-to-reduce-care-gaps-and-improve-eye-and-vision-health>)[![UCSF Healthhub digital health awards 2022 logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e0ba1ef15200749b06eac1a/668c96f4764cd184aee3c9e6_DocGo%20%2B%20Spect.png)June 22nd, 2024The American Diabetes Association Names Winners of Diabetes Innovation Challenge](http://www.getspect.com/<https:/www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/the-american-diabetes-association-names-winners-of-diabetes-innovation-challenge-302179616.html>)[![CB insights digital top 150 logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e0ba1ef15200749b06eac1a/658b7b80edde3b4ff4c02119_CHCF%20\(1\).jpg)November 19, 2023Spect advances health equity with mobile diabetes eye exams at Lifelong Medical Care ](http://www.getspect.com/<https:/www.chcf.org/blog/start-up-spect-advances-health-equity-mobile-diabetes-eye-exams/>)
[View all news](http://www.getspect.com/</newsroom>)
  1. Spect’s retinal camera is a general use camera and is only used to take retinal images to be graded by a licensed ophthalmologist or optometrist. The camera does not make any medical recommendations by itself.
  2. Spect’s telemedicine platform is a non-device-MDDS and intended to transfer, store, convert formats, and display medical device data e.g. data from the general use camera.

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Spect**

**Founded:** 2017  
**Location:** Palo Alto, California  
**Team Size:** 7 employees  
**Batch:** Y Combinator S17  
**Website:** [getspect.com](http://www.getspect.com)  

**Mission:** Intend to prevent blindness through value-based retinal screening in primary care settings.

### The Problem
Vision diseases cause immeasurable suffering. Globally, 415 million people with diabetes are at risk of conditions like Diabetic Retinopathy (DR) and Glaucoma. Currently, screening for these conditions relies heavily on ophthalmologists, making the process inefficient and costly, especially as the number of patients rises. 

### The Solution
Spect offers a solution that transforms retinal exams into a streamlined, efficient process without needing specialized training for staff. Their portable retinal camera allows screenings for diseases right in the primary care setting—after just 15 minutes of training, existing medical staff can conduct exams with a 95% success rate.

**Efficiency:**
- **Quick Exam Duration:** Retinal exams can be conducted in under 3 minutes.
- **Rapid Reporting:** Results are processed and reported back to healthcare providers within 24 hours.
- **High Gradability:** Over 95% of the images captured are gradable on the first attempt.

**Why it Matters:** Early detection can prevent up to 90% of diabetes-related blindness, and currently, fewer than 40% of diabetes patients receive the recommended annual eye exams. Spect directly addresses this gap by making eye care accessible and integrating seamlessly into existing healthcare workflows.

### Current Partnerships
Spect collaborates with various healthcare providers, including:
- Accountable Care Organizations (ACOs)
- Community Health Centers
- Independent Physician Associations (IPAs)
- Health Systems and more

Notable partners include **DocGo**, which has leveraged Spect's technology to increase diabetic retinal screenings significantly, and **Maryland Community Health System**, where Spect's solutions have enhanced the implementation of diabetic eye examinations.

### Recent Highlights
- In 2024, Spect partnered with DocGo to address care gaps and enhance eye and vision health.
- Featured in the UCSF Healthhub Digital Health Awards for innovative solutions.

### Conclusion
Spect isn’t just another health tech company; it’s a response to a critical healthcare challenge. With a value-driven approach to retinal screening, Spect’s mission to prevent blindness is not only admirable but also achievable with their cutting-edge solutions. The combination of technology, ease of use, and rigorous focus on data privacy positions them for significant impact in healthcare. If you're interested in adopting their solutions, there’s no better time than now.
